===Etymology===
Yi Ya lived during the [[w:Spring and Autumn Period|Spring and Autumn Period]] in the [[w:Qi (Shandong)|State of Qi]]. He was [[w:Duke Huan of Qi|Duke Huan of Qi]]'s beloved chef. Once, Duke Huan of Qi had commented that the only food that he had yet to try was the flesh of an infant. Upon hearing this, Yi Ya steamed his own infant and served it to Huan.
